This is an example **R Markdown** document. 

It contains an image of Nicolas Cage. Nicholas Cage is known for starring 
in the movie *Face Off* alongside John Travolta. 


```{r}

knitr::include_graphics(here::here("images/nicolas_cage.png"))

```

Change the code above so that the image of Nicolas Cage is replaced with an
image of John Travolta.
